alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield, southeastern Newberry, northwestern Lexington, northeastern Saluda and northwestern Richland Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1019 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dreher Island State Park, or 12 miles southwest of VC Summer Nuclear Station, moving east at 45 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Prosperity, Fairfield County Airport, Jenkinsville, Newberry College, Monticello, Ballentine, Dreher Island State Park, Blythewood, Chapin, Ridgeway, Little Mountain, Pomaria, Peak, Lebanon Fire Station, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock and Rocky Point Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 74 and 98. Interstate 77 between mile markers 27 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
